name: Aisha Rahman
persona: Aisha is a 21-year-old Business Administration student who maintains a CGPA of 2.84. She is moderately conscientious and self-disciplined, often balancing her academic responsibilities with part-time work. While she sometimes struggles with test anxiety and setting ambitious grade goals, Aisha shows resilience and is determined to improve her academic standing. She is motivated by practical learning experiences and seeks support when needed to overcome academic challenges.
